display_long_description:
# Exorcism Agency Overview
Exorcism Agency is a multiplayer exorcism game. You’ll step into the shoes of exorcists exploring creepy spots and featuring the full exorcism process, from detection to hunting.  
[media]

# Your Mission Start
You’ll starting your journey from “Haunted Village,” the tough “Twins Villa,” and the extreme “Forbidden School.” Face off against 8+ ghost types like “Evil Clown” and “Crawl Woman,” using 20+ tools like EMF detectors, Geiger counters, Spirit boxes, Salt gun,  Holy water to gather evidence and exorcise it.

# Explore the story hidden behind 
Every ghost may hide a tragic story, making exorcism a journey of understanding. If you careful enough and dive deep. There will be some special things waiting for you!
[media] 

# Team work is the heart 
Teamwork is at the heart of the game. Match with friends as a detective, guardian, or support. Each role is crucial for success. Meantime We offering two multiplayer mode. Squad or **Reservation System**. Via that you can booking a time slot to play with global players.

# Elite level exorcism equipment 
Powerful features above standard. Some of that are amazing like Frozen Gun/Tesla Gun Plus/Polariod Plus and etc...Each of that was unique!
[media]

# High Learning Curve 
This is not a simple game. You should Join our Discord at **https://discord.gg/XTQSvRyuNs!**  to get more tips and equipments to start up!

Welcome to Exorcism Agency! Assemble your exorcism team and gear up for this thrilling supernatural adventure!
